label: Summer Camps
description: Programs for children and teenagers during the summer months, typically involving outdoor activities, sports, and socializing.
intents: Find a summer camp for my child
Plan summer activities for my teenager

subcategories.label: Weight Loss Camps
subcategories.description: Summer camps focused on helping children and teenagers lose weight through exercise and healthy eating habits.

subcategories.label: Sports Camps
subcategories.description: Summer camps focused on specific sports or general athletic activities.

subcategories.label: Arts and Performance Camps
subcategories.description: Summer camps focused on creative and performing arts, such as music, theater, and dance.

subcategories.label: Language and Cultural Immersion Camps
subcategories.description: Summer camps focused on language learning and cultural immersion, often involving travel to foreign countries.

subcategories.label: Outdoor Adventure Camps
subcategories.description: Summer camps focused on outdoor activities and adventure, such as hiking, camping, and wilderness survival.
